content.question: Which of the different components of smog depicted in the graph are most likely released from automobile exhaust?

choices.label: <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Describe relationships among variables in data represented.
